Name: The Zone
About the game: An unsuccessful experiment was done on an island at URSS and it was resulted in a creation of an unknown chemical element. When the particles of this element enter in contact with electric waves, a portal opens and bring from another dimension strange creatures. Dimitri was ordered to investigate the local where the experiment was occurred and disable all the electrical installations to avoid that these creatures have multiplies and go out of the island. Your goal in the game is kill all aliens and disable the electrical installations spread around the map. Think in some strategic to disable all the electrical installations while the safe zone is closing. Kill all aliens in front of you to rise in the ranking. Third person shooter; Ranking online; Achievements; A big open map; 3 weapon and 1 grenade; Drink vodka to heal;
